Package com.project.alertapp.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.project.alertapp.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
This class provides REST request for alerts.
Author:
KaanSarigul

  • Method Details

    • getAllUser

      @GetMapping public List<User> getAllUser()
      This method sends a request to userService to get all user.
      Returns:
      Returns list of users.

    • getOneUser

      @GetMapping("/{userId}") public User getOneUser​(@PathVariable Long userId)
      This method sends a request to userService to get one user with userId parameter.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      Returns:
      Returns requested user.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/{userId}/delete") public void deleteUser​(@PathVariable Long userId)
      This method sends a request to userService to delete one user with userId parameter.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.

    • softDeleteUser

      @PutMapping("/{userId}/delete") public User softDeleteUser​(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody SoftDeleteRequest deleteRequest)
      This method sends a request to userService to soft delete one user with userId parameter.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      deleteRequest - SoftDeleteRequest object contains soft delete situation for an object.
      Returns:
      Returns updated user.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/{userId}") public User updateUser​(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody UpdateUserRequest updateUser)
      This method sends a request to userService to update user with userId parameter.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      updateUser - Contains user data, cannot be null.
      Returns:
      Returns updated user.

    • updateUserPassword

      @PutMapping("/{userId}/changePassword") public User updateUserPassword​(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody UpdatePasswordRequest updatePassword)
      This method sends a request to userService to change user password with userId parameter.
      Parameters:
      userId - Id of requested user.
      updatePassword - Contains new password data, cannot be null.
      Returns:
      Returns updated data.
